tool_description: Live 4D results for Malaysia and Singapore.
name: 4D Results
title: 4D Results

api_list.name: Get Past Results (2021 onwards)
api_list.description:
Return all company 4D Results within a specific date range.
(2021 onwoard data and only available for ULTRA PLAN subscriber)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://4d-results.p.rapidapi.com/get_4d_result_range/2020-01-01/2020-03-31"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "4d-results.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://4d-results.p.rapidapi.com/get_4d_result_range/{start}/{end}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "4d-results.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Past Results (10 years)
api_list.description:
Return all company 4D Results within a specific date range.
(Up to 10 year data and only available for MEGA PLAN subscriber)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://4d-results.p.rapidapi.com/get_4d_past_results/2010-01-01/2010-03-31"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "4d-results.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get 4D Results
api_list.description:
Get 4D results by date and company.
Results including 4D and jackpot.

required_parameters.name: company
required_parameters.description: Magnum (MAGNUM), Sports Toto (TOTO), Damacai (DAMACAI), Cashsweep (CASHSWEEP), Sabah 88 (SABAH88), Sadakan (STC), Singapore (SG)

api_list.name: 4D Dream Dictionary
api_list.description: Return relevant 4D/3D lucky draw number based on keyword (english/chinese) of your dream.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: en for English, zh for Chinese (simplifed)

api_list.name: Get 4D Company List
api_list.description:
Return available company code and name.
Code can use as parameter to query the Get 4D Results method.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://4d-results.p.rapidapi.com/get_4d_companies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "4d-results.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
